quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Rubies and Kind
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, fiction, stars. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of the girl that can return home to Kansas by simply clicking the heels of her magical ruby slippers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dorothy

questions.question: What is the meaning of the Latin word ruber from which the word ruby is derived?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: red

questions.question: Which wedding anniversary is traditionally called a Ruby Anniversary?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 40th

questions.question: What detective retrieves a fabulous ruby stolen from an eastern prince in the short story The Theft of the Royal Ruby?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hercule Poirot

questions.question: The presence of what  chemical element causes the red color of rubies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: chromium

questions.question: What band/artist originally recorded the song Ruby Tuesday, which is on Rolling Stone magazine list of the 500 Greatest Songs of All Time?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Rolling Stones

questions.question: The war between the White and Red Rose in England have been leads to change which dynasty on the throne.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Merovingians

questions.question: William Powell never won an Academy Award.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The domination of Merovingians coincides with the period of King Arthur - the time for which the most chivalrous novels written for the Holy Grail.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which was the father of the mystery ruler Merovey according the legend.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Both of these

questions.question: What actress stars in the 1998 movie A Price Above Rubies which borrows its title from the biblical quote, Who can find a virtuous woman? For her price is far above rubies.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Renée Zellweger

questions.question: William Powell was engaged to this very popular actress who died suddenly of kidney disease.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jean Harlow

questions.question: What American science fiction and fantasy author penned the books about the the Skolian Empire known as Tales of the Ruby Dynasty?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Catherine Asaro

questions.question: Some of the the most famous rubies in crown jewels around the world, including the Black Princes Ruby and the Timur Ruby in the British Crown Jewels, are actually what kind of mineral?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: spinel

questions.question: What kind of product, developed in Japan in the mid 1990s, was named Ruby?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a programming language

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Help and Novel
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, pair, dagobert. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The Merovingians themselves believe that their magic strength lies in
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Their hair

questions.question: In Kathryn Stocketts book The Help, Skeeter and Hilly were roommates at what University?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ole Miss

questions.question: In the novel The Help, what is the name of Aibilenes son who dies as a result of delayed medical attention following an accident?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Treelore

questions.question: From which Mississippi town does fictional character Celia Foote hail?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sugar Ditch

questions.question: In the novel The Help, Skeeter Phelan decides to write a book based on the point of view of maids in her hometown. What is Skeeters given name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eugenia

questions.question: Which of the following have been considered for descendant of the Merovingians.

options.text: Monks of the Brotherhood of Zion

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What nickname is eventually given to Hilly Holbrook in the novel The Help?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Two-Slice Hilly

questions.question: In which book the main hero discovers that she is a descendant of the Merovingian blood line as well as Jesus Christ.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Da Vinci Code

questions.question: Which fictional maid/employer pair is incorrect?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Constantine - Miss Walters

questions.question: Dagobert was the eldest son of Chlothar II and Haldetrude and also
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Haribert I became a victim of the first church of excommunication Merovingian king
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Saint Clotilde (475–545) was married the Merovingian Clovis, King of the Franks.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: According the legends Merovingians as descendants of the Trojans or of a five-headed sea monster known as the Quinotaur
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the novel The Help, what is the name of the advice column written first by Skeeter, then by Aibilene?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Miss Myrna

questions.question: Who is the first maid to agree to be interviewed by Skeeter in the book The Help?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aibilene

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Help and Dalai Lama
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, dalai, controversy. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Tenzin Gyatso, who was born in 1935, is the fourteenth Dalai Lama.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In The Help, what did Hilly find covering her front yard, after Skeeter printed the wrong word in the Junior Leagues newsletter?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: toilets

questions.question: What did Yule May steal from Miss Hilly in the novel The Help?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a garnet ring

questions.question: In 1989 Dalai Lama received the Nobel Peace Prize.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The Help character Aibilene is put off the bus far from her home due to panic over the assassination of which civil rights leader?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Medgar Evers

questions.question: Which of the statements is not true about the end of the book The Help?

options.text: Yule May is released from prison.
Aibilene is fired by Miss Leefolt.
Skeeter is offered a job in New York.
Minny has a job for life with Celia and Johnny Foote.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yule May is released from prison.

questions.question: In 1950 the 14th Dalai Lama was enthroned formally as the temporal ruler of Tibet.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: At the Junior League Benefit, fictional character Celia Foote accidentally tears Hillys gown. What social faux pas does she commit next?

options.text: She invites a maid to sit with her.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She throws up.

questions.question: Dalai Lama literally means teacher, whose wisdom is great as the ocean.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which Dalai Lama was supported by Güshi Khanand in the unification of Tibet?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The fifth

questions.question: The 14th Dalai Lama attracted controversy for which of the following issues?

options.text: his treatment of Dorje Shugden followers

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What was the name of the machine Skeeters mother bought to straighten her hair in The Help?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the Shinolater

questions.question: The 14th Dalai Lama sought refuge in India following the failed 1959 Tibetan uprising.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Name the first recognised reincarnation of the Dalai Lama.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gendun Drup

questions.question: What phrase did Minny use to refer to what she did to Miss Hilly in the book The Help?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the Terrible Awful

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Abel and Portrait
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, dalai, cereal. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who wrote Isle of Dogs, Cruel and Unusual, and Portrait of a Killer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Patricia Cornwall

questions.question: Who wrote Chopping Spree, Double Shot and The Cereal Murders?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Diane Mott Davidson

questions.question: Who wrote Mila 18, Trinity and Exodus?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leon Uris

questions.question: The 13th Dalai Lama believed that he would be the last Dalai Lama.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Who wrote Kane and Abel, Paths of Glory, and False Impressions?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jeffrey Archer

questions.question: Who wrote The Mephisto Club, The Apprentice, and The Surgeon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tess Gerritsen

questions.question: Where did the 14th Dalai Lama spend his childhood years?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: in Lhassa

questions.question: Who wrote Double Whammy, Sick Puppy, and Star Island?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carl Hiaasen

questions.question: Who wrote Black Sunday, Red Dragon, and Hannibal Rising?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thomas Harris

questions.question: Who wrote The Postcard Killers, Roses Are Red, and London Bridges?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: James Patterson

questions.question: Who wrote Final Jeopardy, The Bone Vault, and Killer Heat?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Linda Fairstein

questions.question: Who wrote Bone by Bone, The Judas Goat, and Mallorys Oracle?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Carol OConnell

questions.question: Who wrote The Prince of Beverly Hills, Strategic Moves, and Orchid Beach?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stuart Woods

questions.question: Who wrote The Colorado Kid, Duma Key, and Blockade Billy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stephen King

questions.question: Who wrote Memorial Day, Term Limits, and Separation of Power?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vince Flynn

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Game and Kf
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, traders, perk. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Besides being labelled zombies the creatures featured in the game KF are referred to as which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Specimens

questions.question: What do you have to accomplish in order to get to the traders shop in the game KF?

options.text: Locate the trader via GPS and contact her by radio
Kill off all the specimens in a single wave

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kill off all the specimens in a single wave

questions.question: In the KF game, you can only obtain your weapons at the traders shop.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is the name of the company that developed the KF game?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tripwire Interactive

questions.question: What is the perk associated with the use of melee weapons in KF?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: berserker

questions.question: What statement is true about the whitelisted map in KF?

options.text: The title of the map is all in white.
It is a map where one can raise the level of their perks.
It is a map which enables you to choose how many players you want in the game.
It is a map that is playable only in single player mode.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is a map where one can raise the level of their perks.

questions.question: When playing KF online you cannot play the same character if someone else is already playing him.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: KF started out as a mod for this popular PC game.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Unreal Tournament 2004

questions.question: In KF, what is the perk in which one can do the most damage with the flame thrower?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: firebug

questions.question: Who wrote Playing for Pizza, The Brethren, and The Street Lawyer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Grisham

questions.question: In the game KF, only the medic can heal others.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Although widely advertised as a multiplayer co-op game KF can also be played in single player mode.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who wrote Bloody Bones, Skin Trade, and Guilty Pleasures?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Laurell K. Hamilton

questions.question: In KF, you can weld doors shut in order to prevent the specimens from reaching you.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: If you want to quit the KF game and play later you can always save your game and continue from where you left off.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Characters and Author
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, brain, clutter. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Trufflehunter, Nikabrik and Reepicheep are characters created by this author.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: C.S. Lewis

questions.question: This author is responsible for depicting the characters of Virgil Flowers, Lucas Davenport and Weather Karkkinen.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Sandford

questions.question: In KF, you can cause the bloat to fight with the other specimens.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: This creature is the son of Medusa and Poseidon, and was born out of Medusas bleeding neck when she was beheaded by Perseus.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pegasus

questions.question: Which god, when born, was hidden in a cave and replaced by a stone?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zeus

questions.question: Don Tommasino, Paulie Gatto and Genco Abandando are all characters in which book?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Godfather

questions.question: The Philanthropist achievement is obtained by the player in the KF game by which of the following?

options.text: Giving one of your weapons to a player who has just showed up on the scene
Healing one of your teammates after being injured by one of the specimens
Saving someones life when attacked by one of the specimens
Giving 1,000 Pounds to teammates who have 50% of your cash or less

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Giving 1,000 Pounds to teammates who have 50% of your cash or less

questions.question: What author wrote the series of books in which youd find characters named Milo, Robin and Dr. Delaware?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jonathan Kellerman

questions.question: Athena was born fully grown out of Zeuss brain. What was she worshipped for?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wisdom

questions.question: According to Greek mythology, when Danae was locked in a copper tower, unable to meet any man, Hermes took pity on her and came down as golden rain, making her conceive and give birth to a son named Perseus.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In what book would you find Mrs. Dubose, Miss Stephanie and Miss Maudie?

options.text: Fried Green Tomatoes at the Whistle Stop Cafe

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To Kill a Mockingbird

questions.question: This author wrote about the murder of the Clutter family in the first novelization of a true crime.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Truman Capote

questions.question: In which book would you find characters named Mae Mobley, Skeeter and Hilly?

options.text: Are You There God, Its Me, Margaret?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Help

questions.question: Sometimes Poseidons children went wrong and became strange one-eyed beasts. What were these creatures called?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cyclopes

questions.question: Which author created these characters: Celeste Chalfonte, Nickle, and sisters Juts and Weezy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rita Mae Brown
